definitions.definition: A short musical composition for an informal occasion often with the character of improvisation and usually to be played solo .
Any composition , musical or otherwise, that is created on the spot without preparation.

main_definition: ( music ) A short musical composition for an informal occasion often with the character of improvisation and usually to be played solo .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any composition , musical or otherwise, that is created on the spot without preparation.
